title: Firefox for Android 43.0 Release

notes.note:
Users can now mark read/unread state of items in [reading list panel][1]


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/save-web-pages-your-reading-list-firefox-android#w_access-your-reading-list

[Tab audio indicator][1] displays in tab list 


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/identify-noisy-tabs-firefox-android

[Include URL when sharing selected text][1] from web page


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-do-i-share-things-firefox-android#w_how-do-i-share-from-a-web-page

[Accessibility improvements][1] for scrolling, zooming, braille, and context menus in Talkback screen reader


  [1]: http://blog.monotonous.org/2015/09/15/firefox-for-android-accessibility-refresh/
New split pane styling for History panel on tablets in landscape mode
Updated toolbar menu to match latest Android UI designs

Improved [API support for m4v][1] video playback


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLMediaElement/canPlayType

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
